description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Use a series of satisfying weapons to annihilate hordes of monsters in this unique "single stick" shooter. Experience 4 levels of difficulty, up to 4 player coop, local highscores, and a killer soundtrack courtesy of Razorback Records. "Boom Chick Chick", it's music to my ears.
